Base URL #

Development URL #

http://localhost:3333/v1/api
1

Production URL #

https://api.localmerch.in/v1/api
1

Route /admin/ #

Business #

Get all businesses #

GET /business
1
ParameterTypeDescription
authorizationstringRequired. Your API key

Get a business by id #


  GET /business
1
2
3
ParameterTypeDescription
authorizationstringRequired. Your API key
idstringRequired. Business id

Request #

{
	"id": "611caf130e517a5694109ab7"
}
1
2
3

Create a business #


POST /business
1
2
3
ParameterTypeDescription
authorizationstringRequired. Your API key
uidstringRequired. firebase uid
namestringRequired. business name
emailstringRequired. business email
usernamestringRequired. business username
c_emailstringRequired. email for client
brandstringRequired. brand name
phonestringRequired. phone
categorystringRequired. category
descstringRequired. description
instastringRequired. insta link
linkstringRequired. other links
zipstringRequired. pin code
cpstringRequired. cover pic
dpstringRequired. display pic

Update a business #

PUT /business
1
ParameterTypeDescription
authorizationstringRequired. Your API key
uidstringRequired. firebase uid
namestringRequired. business name
usernamestringRequired. business username
phonestringRequired. phone
categorystringRequired. category
descstringRequired. description
instastringRequired. insta link
linkstringRequired. other links
activebooleanRequired. active
panstringRequired. pan
zipstringRequired. pin code

Delete a business #

DELETE /business
1
ParameterTypeDescription
authorizationstringRequired. Your API key
idstringRequired. Business id

Products #

Get all products of a business by business id #

GET /products
1
ParameterTypeDescription
authorizationstringRequired. Your API key

Get individual product by id #

GET /products
1
ParameterTypeDescription
authorizationstringRequired. Your API key
idstringRequired. Business id

Create a new product #

POST /products
1
ParameterTypeDescription
authorizationstringRequired. Your API key
uidstringRequired. firebase uid
namestringRequired. business name
descstringRequired. description
pricestringRequired. product price
owner_idstringRequired. other links
picsbooleanRequired. picture link
sizestringRequired. size
colourstringRequired. colour
limitstringRequired. limit

Update a product #

PUT /products
1
ParameterTypeDescription
authorizationstringRequired. Your API key
uidstringRequired. firebase uid
namestringRequired. business name
descstringRequired. description
pricenumberRequired. product price
limitnumberRequired. other links
picsbooleanRequired. picture link
sizestringRequired. size
colourstringRequired. colour
activebooleanRequired. active

Delete a product #

DELETE /products
1
ParameterTypeDescription
authorizationstringRequired. Your API key
idstringRequired. Business id

Orders #

Get all orders #

GET /orders
1
ParameterTypeDescription
authorizationstringRequired. Your API key

Get order by id #

GET /orders
1
ParameterTypeDescription
authorizationstringRequired. Your API key
idstringRequired. id

Get all orders of a business by business id #

GET /orders
1
ParameterTypeDescription
authorizationstringRequired. Your API key
idstringRequired. Business id

Get all orders of a customer by customer id #

GET /orders
1
ParameterTypeDescription
authorizationstringRequired. Your API key
idstringRequired. Business id

create a new order #

POST /orders
1
ParameterTypeDescription
authorizationstringRequired. Your API key
uidstringRequired. firebase uid
idstringRequired. business id
namestringRequired. business name
emailstringRequired. email
shippingstringRequired. shipping details
brandnumberRequired. brand name
paymentbooleanRequired. payment details
orderstringRequired. order details
additionalstringRequired. additional details

Update an order status #

PUT /orders
1
ParameterTypeDescription
authorizationstringRequired. Your API key
idstringRequired. id
activebooleanRequired. active

Customers #

GET /customers
1
ParameterTypeDescription
authorizationstringRequired. Your API key
idstringRequired. Business id

ParameterTypeDescription
authorizationstringRequired. Your API key
uidstringRequired. firebase uid
namestringRequired. business name
emailstringRequired. email
shippingstringRequired. shipping details

ParameterTypeDescription

namestringRequired. business name
emailstringRequired. email

ParameterTypeDescription
authorizationstringRequired. Your API key

Route /client/ #

Business #

Get a list of all businesses #

GET /business
1
ParameterTypeDescription
authorizationstringRequired. Your API key

Products #

Get all products of a business by business id #

GET /products
1
ParameterTypeDescription
authorizationstringRequired. Your API key
idstringRequired. id
business_idstringRequired. business id

Get individual product by id #

GET /products
1
ParameterTypeDescription
authorizationstringRequired. Your API key
idstringRequired. id

Customers #

Get a specific customer by id or login #

GET /customers
1
ParameterTypeDescription
authorizationstringRequired. Your API key
idstringRequired. id

Create a new customer or register a new customer #

POST /customers
1
ParameterTypeDescription
authorizationstringRequired. Your API key
idstringRequired. id
emailstringRequired. email
namestringRequired. name
uidstringRequired. uid

Update a customer #

PUT /customers
1
ParameterTypeDescription
authorizationstringRequired. Your API key
idstringRequired. id
emailstringRequired. email
namestringRequired. name
shippingstringRequired. shipping

Orders #

GET /customers
1
ParameterTypeDescription

idstringRequired. id
